name: Doge Savior Tycoon
description:
You s̶t̶e̶a̶l̶ SAVE doges from other people, and when they post "DOG LOST" you give them back and humbly enjoy the reward.
The thing is, the longer you hold on to a dog, for some reason policemen start chasing you! But the dog's reward get's bigger and bigger with time... how long can you last?
Walk using WASD
Grab dog leash using SPACE
Open inventory using E
Restart using

have fun.

Code:  Eedo Shapira, Yoav Pinhas

Game design & original music: Shaked Lotan

Art: Calaneit Yuzuk
